## Highlighted words

/getStringLength/1-2

```js /getStringLength/1-2
const getStringLength = (str) => str.length;

const strLen = getStringLength('str');

const anotherStrLen = getStringLength('anotherStr');
```

```js /getStringLength/1,3
const getStringLength = (str) => str.length;

const strLen = getStringLength('str');

const anotherStrLen = getStringLength('anotherStr');
```
